__e: Clark, he's had a thousand names and he's lived for centuries.
This booby trap must be centuries old, and it still works.
But the thing is, these blades are old, centuries old.
We've been searching for the Crucifixion cross for eight centuries, as have others.
I turned my back on that quest. The, uh, evil... that had presided over this world for so many centuries... had withdrawn into the shadows once again, and I- I felt I had missed my chance.
I remember a voice. Did I hear it say I had been sleeping for two centuries?
It wasn't recovered for three centuries.
For centuries, it was separated from me, causing my soul to wander through a world of shadows.
For centuries, my only place was by your side.
